title: What Are the Secrets of the Peacock Library? And an Interview With Roy Wood Jr. of ‘The Daily Show’
description:
Though it’s dense and complicated, ‘Dark’ is still an enticing show (3:25). NBC’s streaming service, Peacock, will be here soon, along with a large back catalog of shows and the sneaky-popular ‘Yellowstone’ (13:04). Plus, an interview with Roy Wood Jr. (25:34).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Roy Wood Jr.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
